summary: Looking for new stuff to watch because for some reason I have sort of lost interest in SKAM France (I still love you, I just...
body: Looking for new stuff to watch because for some reason I have sort of lost interest in SKAM France (I still love you, I just need space right now.) after abstaining from watching clips for a week. Lol. Kinda leaning towards Heimebane if they made at least one of the players gay. Hahah! So many familiar faces, plus it’s football so… yeah. Sleep. So tired.

summary: This episode is called insomnia, so I really really want to get a late night clip because we rarely get those? like imagine...
question: This episode is called insomnia, so I really really want to get a late night clip because we rarely get those? like imagine thinking that's it for the day and then getting one at like 11 p.m or later because Lucas can't fall asleep. That's a very specific wish from me but I'm just wondering where else the insomnia will come in. And do you think Lucas will find Eliott's instagram? That would be such a nice confirmation that he cares about Lucas (for Lucas, we of course know that)
answer: watch them to release a clip tomorrow because tomorrow is wednesday and i go to sleep early on wednesdays, and they released clips two (2) times on that day, both after 9 pm. though i think it’s gonna be a really late night clip like after 12 am, so technically we will get a thursday clip, because i feel like 11 pm it’s pretty early especially for insomnia. i think lucas will find eliott’s instagram and it’s gonna be an important part of their story, some people think that he will find out about it in episode nine when he will be doubting in eliott’s feelings again, and once he finds it and sees all the posts he will realise how much eliott loves him. i don’t know if we see that though, because this fandom always has great theories but david and niels always prove us wrong ahah, but i have no doubts that lucas will find eliott’s instagram

summary: I know this is a hard week of SKAM but honestly this is what I like best about it. Going through the characters pain and...
body: I know this is a hard week of SKAM but honestly this is what I like best about it. Going through the characters pain and loneliness and isolation and understanding them because we all go through the same thing. They think they’re alone but we know they’re not alone
